articles.description: Anushka Sharma took to Instagram to pen a sweet birthday wish for Pari director Prosit Roy. The star took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes photo with him and penned a birthday wish for him. Check it out.

articles.title: Here's Pulkit Samrat's Gluten-free Recipe For Kriti Kharbanda - News18
articles.description: The lockdown has turned Pulkit Samrat into a chef, and he is trying new recipes everyday to make his foodie girlfriend Kriti Kharbanda happy.
articles.content:
Pulkit has baked a sour dough gluten free bread for his ladylove Kriti Kharbanda and she absolutely loves it.
Kriti took to Instagram to share a photograph of the bread. "Sour dough gluten free bread.. baked by the best(hired by me personally) - @pulkitsamra… [+1332 chars]

articles.title: Let’s look at Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas’ posh house In California - Asianet News English
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have allowed fans to have a peek at their luxurious house in California, USA
articles.content: The house also has a gymnasium, movie theatre, wet bar, game room, indoor basketball court, a bowling alley, infinity pool, a lawn and additional seating arrangements.

articles.content:

articles.title: Bengali Actress Koel Mallick Gives Birth to Baby Boy, Showered with Wishes From Tollywood - News18
articles.description: Koel Mallick and her producer husband Nispal Singh have become proud parents of a baby boy, the actress revealed on Instagram.
articles.content:
Actress Koel Mallick, one of the top names in Bengali cinema, has welcomed a baby boy. It's the first child for Koel and her husband Nispal Singh Rane, who got married in 2013 after dating for almost seven years.
The baby was born early Tuesday morning in a … [+1017 chars]

articles.description: Joe Russo has signed on to write a follow-up to the hit Netflix film, Extraction, 10 days after the film’s release. Once the script is done, deals with Chris Hemsworth and Sam Hargrave will be made.
articles.content:
